wood.name: Wood
wood.description: A sturdy piece of wood. Useful for building and fuel.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: A chunk of rock. Good for basic tools and structures.

scrap.name: Scrap Metal
scrap.description: Twisted metal from the old world. Can be smelted and repurposed.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: A tough, slightly mutated apple. Keeps hunger at bay.

components.name: Components
components.description: Advanced electronic parts. Key to automation.

uranium.name: Uranium
uranium.description: A rare, radioactive element needed for high-tier power.

silver.name: Silver
silver.description: An old-world currency, still valued by traders.

mutatedTwigs.name: Mutated Twigs
mutatedTwigs.description: Flexible, oddly colored twigs from the mutated forest. They hum with a faint energy.

ironIngot.name: Iron Ingot
ironIngot.description: A bar of refined iron, ready for advanced crafting.

charcoal.name: Charcoal
charcoal.description: A block of concentrated carbon. A decent fuel source.

appleSeeds.name: Apple Seeds
appleSeeds.description: Seeds extracted from an apple. Can be planted in a Hydroponics Bay.

sand.name: Sand
sand.description: Fine grains of crushed stone. Can be melted into glass.

glassTube.name: Glass Tube
glassTube.description: A hollow glass tube, fragile but useful for crafting.

glassJar.name: Glass Jar
glassJar.description: A sealed glass container, perfect for preserving food.

pickledPeaches.name: Pickled Peaches
pickledPeaches.description: Preserved peaches in a glass jar. A wasteland delicacy worth good silver.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.description: A hardy, orange root vegetable. Grows quickly.

carrotSeeds.name: Carrot Seeds
carrotSeeds.description: Seeds for planting carrots. Grows in 3 minutes.

corn.name: Corn
corn.description: Golden ears of corn. Takes longer to grow but yields plenty.

cornSeeds.name: Corn Seeds
cornSeeds.description: Seeds for planting corn. Grows in 8 minutes.
